entry.title: How to train your alpha werewolf
entry.summary:
Author: everyonelovesLaurence

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 100,339Chapters: 19/29Kudos: 209

Summary: Derek Hale has always known two things about himself: He's not good at making people like him, and he's going to be his sister's second for the Sacramento pack. But when a random assignment leads him to be the new alpha of Beacon Hills, dealing with far too big shoes to fill and a new pack orphan that everyone listens to far more than they do him, he thinks it's his big chance to finally prove his worth to his mother. Besides, it's not forever, is it?Stiles Stilinski has always known two things about himself, too: Being the son of the alpha is a Big Job, and it's his to do, and one day, his mate will be the next alpha of his mother's pack. But when his parents are murdered, and some growly man with expressive eyebrows unwillingly takes her place, he's got two choices: keep glaring at Derek or teach him to man up. At least until he's found a replacement. How long could that take?This is a story about building a pack, finding a home and cuddling with a dog. It's mostly about the dog.

entry.title: The Delta Pair and the Newly Awakened Universe
entry.summary:
Author: Mewwy

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 24,069Chapters: 12/18Kudos: 11

Summary: When the world was introduced to the Supernatural, Sentinels and Guides over a hundred years ago, something remained hidden. Or should I say someone? It has taken two generations for the world tribe to come to terms that mundane human beings are not the only ones on the planet. There are the enhanced, Sentinels and Guides, and the Supernatural. But can there be more? Is there something more?There is a myth that has been foretold by those Guides on the spirit plane, but records offer only tantalizing fragments. Is this legendary prophecy real? And what role do Derek Sebastian Hale and Mieczysław Gajos “Mischief” “Stiles” Stilinski play into its unfolding? If the myth proves true, how far will their families go to shield them from its consequences?

entry.title: A Borrowed Sky
entry.summary:
Author: 1223rhys

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 26,478Chapters: 5/23Kudos: 31

Summary: He thought he could outrun his past. After a shootout leaves his gang scattered and the law on his heels, Derek slips into another man’s life—marriage offer and all. But he didn’t expect Stiles: clever, stubborn, and heartbreakingly sincere. And when the past catches up, Derek will have to choose what kind of man he really is—the one he left behind, or the one he’s pretending to be. Marriage was part of the plan. Falling in love wasn’t.

entry.title: All Hale Caffeine - Book 1
entry.summary:
Author: Molly_Is_A_Fangirl

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 38,751Chapters: 6/15Kudos: 86

Summary: Prompt: Coffee shop Au where the owner is increasingly concerned about the amount of caffeine this customer is ingesting.Derek returned to Beacon Hills with his sister once she’d finished college. He’d attended business school for a few years and decided that he’d open his own coffee shop: All Hale Caffeine - Laura picked it. They had gotten the shop up and running while visiting his uncle who was slowly starting to get better and working on rebuilding the old house. After all, it was time to start living again.Stiles Stilinski was 17, a spark, and just trying to finish high school. That proves impossible when his best friend gets bitten by a rogue alpha. Queue the Hales entering their lives as Stiles and Scott deal with the mess they’ve found themselves in. At least Stiles is getting good coffee out of this ordeal - if only the Sourwolf owner would stop commenting on his health.A Season 1 AU Rewrite - where the Hales return two-ish years before season 1’s events. Peter doesn’t go insane, Scott still gets bitten, and Stiles already knows about the supernatural world. Oh, and Derek had actual therapy while in New York.

entry.title: Crown of Forget-Me-Not's
entry.summary:
Author: CozyEarth

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,854Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 6

Summary: Grief is a funny thing.It hits everyone differently and presents itself in many different forms.They say that there are five stages of grief, but for Stiles, they all ended with him crying.Stiles always hated the crying.Sorrowful tears that would make him spiral into despair. Hatefully angry tears that burned his eyes and fueled his sharp tongue. Happy tears that washed over a wave of melancholy.Stiles hated it every single time.Because when Stiles cried, it was all consuming. -Losing a parent hurts.Even when it's years later.Even when the world gets turned on its head, the supernatural is real, and your best friend leaves you to the wolves for a girl.Literally!Stiles knows he has a lot to work through, but everything keeps piling up.What will be the breaking point?And will he allow himself to ask for help?

entry.title: Copain of the black wolf.
entry.summary:
Author: EverythingRara

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 195,943Chapters: 23/40Kudos: 719

Summary: A Sterek rewrite of the show, that stays mostly canon compliant in the beginning, shown exclusively through the eyes of Stiles Stilinski, unknown soul mate of Derek Hale.Starts slow emotionally, my first attempt at a story of this degree please be gentle.Stiles grunted softly as he heaved himself onto the roof, his sneakers scuffing against the shingles. Scott—his best friend since forever—wasn’t answering his phone, and Stiles couldn’t wait. There was no way Scott was going to believe what Stiles had just overheard.Keeping low, Stiles crept along the roof toward Scott’s window, his heart racing as the cool night air pressed against his skin. He tried the window, but it wouldn’t budge—it was locked.“Of course it’s locked,” he muttered under his breath, rolling his eyes.Knocking softly on the glass, he leaned in closer, squinting to peer inside. The curtains were drawn, giving him only a hazy, distorted view of the room beyond. “Scott,” he hissed, rapping on the window again. No answer.Suddenly, the curtains shifted, and the window flung open. Scott and Stiles screamed, startling each other.

entry.title: Magical Conclaves, Unions, and Misunderstandings

Author: ChokolatteJedi

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,060Chapters: 12/17Kudos: 351

Summary: Just before his 20th birthday, Stiles learns that the Gajos family has a marriage contract with the Hales, and is informed that he will be upholding it. At the same time, he meets someone intriguing at the Magical UN, someone he'd like to get to know better. Assumptions, misunderstandings, angst, and hurt/comfort ensue.
